x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dchrmhm.g | |- G = ( DChr ` N ) |
| 2 |  | dchrmhm.z | |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) |
| 3 |  | dchrmhm.b | |- D = ( Base ` G ) |
| 4 |  | dchrf.b | |- B = ( Base ` Z ) |
| 5 |  | dchrf.x | |- ( ph -> X e. D ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Unit ` Z ) = ( Unit ` Z ) |
| 7 | 1, 3 | #P_dchrrcl | |- ( X e. D -> N e. NN ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> N e. NN ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 4, 6, 8, 3 | #P_dchrelbas3 | |- ( ph -> ( X e. D <-> ( X : B --> CC /\ ( A. x e. ( Unit ` Z ) A. y e. ( Unit ` Z ) ( X ` ( x ( .r ` Z ) y ) ) = ( ( X ` x ) x. ( X ` y ) ) /\ ( X ` ( 1r ` Z ) ) = 1 /\ A. x e. B ( ( X ` x ) =/= 0 -> x e. ( Unit ` Z ) ) ) ) ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> ( X : B --> CC /\ ( A. x e. ( Unit ` Z ) A. y e. ( Unit ` Z ) ( X ` ( x ( .r ` Z ) y ) ) = ( ( X ` x ) x. ( X ` y ) ) /\ ( X ` ( 1r ` Z ) ) = 1 /\ A. x e. B ( ( X ` x ) =/= 0 -> x e. ( Unit ` Z ) ) ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_simpld | |- ( ph -> X : B --> CC ) |
